translations: 拿来，请来；售得，卖得（某价）；使出（血），使流（泪）；吸（一口气），叹（一口气）；（非正式）给（某人）以（一击）；（非正式）引起极大兴趣（fetch 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: Sue was sitting up in bed, looking very fetching in a flowered bedjacket.
sentences.translation: 她挺身坐在床上，穿着印花睡衣，看起来很迷人。

sentences.sentence: I remember him fetching you lemonade.
sentences.translation: 我记得他给你拿了柠檬汽水。

sentences.sentence: Lina saw this and said, "Listen, old Sanna, why are you fetching so much water?"
sentences.translation: 莉娜看到了，说：“听着，老桑娜，你为什么打这么多水？”
